thread.title: KathNiel enjoins public to vote wisely
thread.title_full: KathNiel enjoins public to vote wisely | mb.com.ph | Philippine News

author: Rowena Tan
title: KathNiel enjoins public to vote wisely
text:
by Rowena Tan
October 25, 2015 Kathryn Bernardo and Daniel Padilla
Teen stars Daniel Padilla and Kathryn Bernardo look forward to exercising their right to vote in 2016. The two have officially registered as voters at the Quezon City Hall recently.
In an ABS-CBN News interview, Daniel related his aim to vote for a presidential candidate that is sincere in his or her effort to uplift the country.
“Hindi pa naman huli ang lahat para makahanap tayo ng magaling na president. Lahat naman iyan magsisimula kung hindi corrupt ang binoto mo. Kapag hindi corrupt, sunud-sunod na ’yan,” Daniel said.
He is still mulling on the candidate that would get his vote.
Kathryn said she will go for someone who will prioritize the needs of the youth.
“Siguro dahil nire-represent ko rin ’yung mga kabataan, we want someone na bibigyan ng chance and papahalagahan ’yung mga kabataan, someone na gusto talaga ’yung trabaho. Dapat dedicated… dapat gusto talaga mag-serve,” she said.
The actress advised voters to get to know the candidates really well before making a decision.
“Dapat makita natin ’yung mga gusto nilang mangyari,” she said.
Kathryn urged Pinoys to go out and register before the Oct. 31 deadline.
“Huwag nating sayangin ang boto natin, and i-take ’yung chance na ’to para maboto talaga kung sino ang karapat-dapat sa mga positions,” she said.
